feed.title: Life seen in bits of 1 and 0

entry.title: Migrating from Tumblr to Octopress
entry.content:
Testing the migration right now. Will get it up and running soon. Looking for themes.

Update: Theme chosen. Most of the tumblr posts just don’t work. Especially the ones that just point to links. I think I’ll leave tumblr blog on and just link to it from here.

Update 2: Decided to remove the tumblr posts.
